comments:
Build ID: n/a

Steps To Reproduce:
use the latest UML distro from eclipse website and enable view.  it will cause eclipse to have a stack overflow.  a clean launch will not reset eclipse so you will have to uninstall eclipse and reinstall

This is not a modeling project issue.  The sequence diagram that seems to be causing this problem is provided by TPTP (and is based on a UML 1.4 implementation they have).
Changing OS from Mac OS to Mac OS X as per bug 185991
Reasssigning to defaul assignee so someone in TPTP will see it.
Chris, which version of TPTP are you using? Did you update using update manager?
Reassign to Platform SWT team for investigation. The problem seems to be happening on Mac OS only, and not reproducible on Win OS.
They are calling update() from inside paint.
